Reviews.Title: Good quality monitor with plenty of inputs.
Reviews.Author: Mom to three boys
Reviews.Content: Only disappointment is that the speakers could be better, but we warned in reviews before purchase. Sounds best with turtle beach headset.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: netshopper "shoppergal"
Reviews.Content: Great price. Great picture. Easy set up. You will not be disappointed.  Would buy another when I need to replace. A monitor.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement TV
Reviews.Author: Fred D. Foster
Reviews.Content: Received the TV in just three days after ordering.  Works great in our MH bedroom.  Easy to install on existing wall hanger.  This was an upgrade from analog unit.

Reviews.Title: First picture issues, now volume issues!!!
Reviews.Author: Howard Kletter
Reviews.Content: Returned one because the picture kept on blacking out!! Received this second one and now the volume is not stable. It gets louder and lower by itself.

Reviews.Title: Keeps on working
Reviews.Author: Joseph Villapaz
Reviews.Content: Still works great after 8 months but now would like a larger screen. If not for outgrowing the size, the monitor performs the same now as when I first purchased it.

Reviews.Title: not bad at all
Reviews.Author: norma jean kringer
Reviews.Content: What a pleasant surprise.  This was the easiest TV I ever had to set up.  I wish I knew about this sooner because I would have bought these for all the bedrooms.

Reviews.Title: ViewSonic TV
Reviews.Author: Downbeat "upbeatconductor"
Reviews.Content: For my rv.  Just the right size.  The only problem being the speakers sounding like listening in a tin can.  Purchased additional Bose speakers at Sam's for only $80.  Beautiful sound.

ProductInfo.Features:
21.5-Inch "Edge White" HD LED panel; 1920x1080 FHD resolution
Programmable TV set-up operation and USB cloning;Internal USB JPEG media player
ATSC,QAM TV Tuner, HDMI, VGA, CVBS, YPbPr; 3w x2 audio
Equalizer audio selections; mounting; 1-Year limited warranty
Table stand included; ViewSonic wall mount -(optional) WM-U1
ProductInfo.Name: ViewSonic VT2215LED 22-Inch 1080p 60Hz LED-lit TV (Black)
